events.question: Ajax wants to return the favor.

events.text:
You still can't find the little guy, huh? That's strange...
Maldoror tells me she liked him alot. He took good care of her.

What's that, [color=#38f5bc]Mal[/color]? What did you do?
Oh no, oh no... Maldoror, why?????
This is bad, kid. Like reeeeeal bad. But I owe you one, so, we're gonna figure this one out together.
Maldoror cast Niki into the [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color] to protect him...
Maldoror is sick and tired of the [color=#0f70ff]Vale of the Living[/color].
She thinks your species is a blight and that Niki doesn't belong here.
Sigh. Not that I disagree with her but this is misguided on her part.
The [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color] is a dangerous, lawless place. 
We've got to go find Niki and bring him back.

events.question: I take it you'd want to join us, kid?

events.text:
You got it, kid. Away we go!
Let's plunge into the darkness together and save the little guy.
I think the three of us will make a good team...

I hope you weren't sweet on Maldoror or anything. She's coming with me back to the [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color] when I go.
I hope you understand. She isn't exactly cut out for this world.
See, her cute looks and docile expressions are far from what lies beneath.
Maldoror is cruel and cunning: just the kind of sidekick I need. I couldn't do my work without her now.
Suit yourself. I'll be here for a short while longer if you need me.
